title: Noam Chomsky mixed with…
author: Vladimir Dietrich
content:
[O artigo original é de 12 de dezembro de 2020, migrado nesta data para este novo blog]

We can emulate known personalities with artificial intelligence.

At any moment we’ll be able to mix personalities.

A good “DJ" (PJ?) would do great mixes!

Imagine Noam Chomsky mixed with… (I am not the DJ).

Tomorrow is coming.
